meanings.sent1: The capturers caught the fish in the river.
meanings.sent2: The capturers trapped the butterfly in a net.
meanings.sent3: The capturers tried to capture the elusive unicorn but failed.
meanings.sent4: The capturers were like skilled hunters tracking their prey.
meanings.sent5: The capturers were determined to catch the runaway dog.

meanings.sent1: The capturers of the thief were praised by the townspeople.
meanings.sent2: The capturers of the moment in a photograph were skilled photographers.
meanings.sent3: The capturers of the attention of the audience were the talented performers.
meanings.sent4: The capturers of memories in a journal were diligent writers.
meanings.sent5: The capturers of the essence of a sunset were the painters on the beach.
